type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.WindowCommands
type.summary: Contains several basic functions for managint a window of the type .

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.WindowCommands.Minimize
property.summary: Returns a value, which contains the command for minimizing the window.
property.value: A command for minimizing the window.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.WindowCommands.Maximize
property.summary: Returns a value, which contains the command for maximizing the window.
property.value: A command for maximizing the window.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.WindowCommands.Restore
property.summary: Returns a value, which contains the command for returning the window into normal state.
property.value: A command for returning the window into normal state.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.WindowCommands.Close
property.summary: Returns a value, which contains the command for closing the window.
property.value: A command for closing the window.
